sentences.en: He was bundled out of the room with unceremonious haste.
She finished the meal with unceremonious haste.
sentences.cn: 她狼吞虎咽地把饭吃完.

sentences.en: The dinner was a relaxed, unceremonious occasion.
sentences.cn: 那次宴会很轻松, 随随便便.

sentences.en: There was an unceremonious directness, a searching, decided steadfastness in his gaze now.
sentences.cn: 现在他的凝视中有一种不礼貌的直率, 一种锐利 、 断然的坚定.

words.tran_cn: 随便的，不拘礼节的；无礼貌的

trans.tran_cn: 不拘礼仪的，随意的，无礼的，唐突的
trans.tran_en: without ceremony; informal, abrupt, rude, or undignified
